about:
I am a self-taught Software Engineer, who is always looking for showcase my talents. I am a full-stack Web2.0 & Web3.0 developer, with experience in Android Development and a Blockchain Enthusiast.


I am passionate about my work. Because I love what I do, I am a quick learner who is always ready to take on new challenges. My excellent problem solving skills and desire to learn makes it easy for me to understand new technologies. 

I also love reading books, watching anime and playing Minecraft
